mapper.select: select * from (select projectApply.*,(select ifmOpenCheck from member where id=projectApply.id) as portfolio, row_number() over (order by seq desc) as num from projectApply where projectSeq=#{projectSeq} order by seq desc) where num between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from projectApply where projectSeq=#{value}
select a.*, m.ifmOpenCheck as portfolio, p.title from projectApply a, member m, project p where a.projectSeq = p.seq and a.id = m.id and a.seq=#{value}
select id, approve from projectApply where projectSeq=#{value}
mapper.update: update projectApply set approve=#{approve} where seq=#{seq}
update projectApply set approve='X' where projectSeq=#{value} and approve='W'
mapper.select: select count(*) from projectApply where id=#{value} and approve='O'
mapper.update: update projectApply set approve='O' where seq=#{value}
update projectApply set approve='X' where seq=#{value}
